spec_data.Name: texlive-luaotfload
spec_data.Description:
The package adopts the TrueType/OpenType Font loader code
provided in ConTeXt, and adapts it to use in Plain TeX and
LaTeX. It works under LuaLaTeX only.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Sun 06 Aug 2017 08:04:38 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: OpenType 'loader' for Plain TeX and LaTeX
